com.opera.core.systems.scope.stp.services

Class ScopeEcmascriptDebugger

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opera.core.systems.scope.AbstractService
      • com.opera.core.systems.scope.AbstractEcmascriptService
        • com.opera.core.systems.scope.stp.services.ScopeEcmascriptDebugger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Service, Debugger, EcmascriptDebugger
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ScopeEcmascriptDebugger6

    public class ScopeEcmascriptDebugger
extends AbstractEcmascriptService
implements EcmascriptDebugger
    Manages the ecmascript-debugger service Handles runtime management and script injection.

      • examineScriptResult

        public Object examineScriptResult(Integer id)
        Description copied from interface: Debugger
        Recursively iterates through the property hierarchies of underneath the given object and unwraps the node elements into suitable types. DOM elements will be coerced into OperaWebElement's, arrays into Java List's, hashes into Map's, numbers into Integer's, and the remaining properties into String's.
        Specified by:
        examineScriptResult in interface Debugger
        Parameters:
        id - the object to examine the hierarchy of
        Returns:
        the unwrapped object tree

        Parameters:

        value - the value to set
